A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: One of the most brilliant Star Wars where layers of understanding are served in a symphony of action\, emotion\, moral and spirituality. All of these flowing in magnificent scenarios where past and future of the saga unite in sublime ways. Luke and Leia tribute  some of their best and new stars strength their roles\, messages\, missions and also nurse existential doubts. Life. Absolutely not to be missed.
